topic.title: Plan Of Care Section - conformance rules

section.p: The Plan of Care Section contains information about the expectations for care to be provided including proposed interventions and goals for improving the condition of the patient.
A plan of care section varies from the assessment and plan section defined above in that it does not include a physician assessment of the patient condition.

ol.li: SHALL conform to IHE Care Plan Section template (templateId: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.3.31)
SHALL conform to CDT Assessment And Plan Section template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.2.7)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entry, such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Medication (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.11.83.8)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entry, such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Immunization (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.11.83.13)

Contains exactly one [1..1] Procedure (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.11.83.17)
SHALL conform to CDT Assessment And Plan Section template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.2.7)
